changelog:
## [vv0.1.99](releases/tag/vv0.1.99) - 2025-10-18
<!-- bump-type:patch -->
### New Features

- make it possible to change slider value with gamepad in ui [`0359f20`](/commit/0359f20b8d721ea44c7ddb633c985a71574c73d3)
- add scroll support for containers using gamepad in ui [`7bb61bf`](/commit/7bb61bf7bde5172423f16526f0361130cf915669)
- add chunks loading progress. can be disabled [`bd166c0`](/commit/bd166c01a3b04502f8c5d2b3af18736a2ad4b1a7)
- add support for alt+arrows navigation to navigate between commands only [`fef94f0`](/commit/fef94f03fb21131cb68a1b665901fb7687afcd13)
- enable music by default, add slider for controlling its volume [`e9f91f8`](/commit/e9f91f8ecda1488c636f35f58cc522f459a29f82)
- add debugServerPacketNames and debugClientPacketNames for quick access of names with intellisense of packets for current protocol. Should be used with `window.inspectPacket` in console [`b239636`](/commit/b239636356c9bb828181cf069c3756c722cebd33)
- make arrows colorful and metadata ([#430](/issues/430))
Co-authored-by: Cursor Agent <cursoragent@cursor.com> [`3b94889`](/commit/3b94889bed40e9c687be52c5ca9a87172c6c6a9d)
- improve fog a little ([#427](/issues/427))
- Add saveLoginPassword option to control password saving behavior in browser for offline auth on servers [`06dc3cb`](/commit/06dc3cb033129f925dd492b01a809e9e5f3cd19c)
- Add overlay model viewer. Already integrated into inventory to display player! [`7f7a14a`](/commit/7f7a14ac65105649621ed825245ca23c2f2c5f85)
- brand new default skybox with fog, better daycycle and colors ([#425](/issues/425))
Co-authored-by: coderabbitai[bot] <136622811+coderabbitai[bot]@users.noreply.github.com> [`b2e3684`](/commit/b2e36840b9d3531ed352e08e09fc54734026cc51)
- new experimental chunk loading logic by forcing into spiral queue [`cc4f705`](/commit/cc4f705aea814c763238a19f96229a12958d7a4c)
- add highly experimental logic to try to self-restore any issues with chunks loading by automating f3+a action. write debug info into chat for now. can be disabled [`cc4f705`](/commit/cc4f705aea814c763238a19f96229a12958d7a4c)
- rework chunks debug screen showing actually useful information now [`cc4f705`](/commit/cc4f705aea814c763238a19f96229a12958d7a4c)
- **big**: items are now rendered in 3d not in 2d and it makes insanely huge difference on the game visuals [`54c114a`](/commit/54c114a702cbbc7e08220d89f5dc8b3b2c96072e)
- add skybox renderer: test it by dragging an image window into window, fix waypoint block pos [`60fc5ef`](/commit/60fc5ef315ea8b73f58070e271dd8f3dc90fc8e4)
- add custom experimental waypints impl [`0a474e6`](/commit/0a474e67803827cdd657b135ba6a7380091cdab4)
### Bug Fixes

- fix fps counter was not visible in fullscreen because of time [`ba42c34`](/commit/ba42c34617675b4c9563f93c8f77e4420b57ab81)
- on waypoint readd old waypoint was floating in world [`d867a5c`](/commit/d867a5cd05bfba3ecc10a8df0b8df0bcb64e709b)
- dont stop local replay server with keep alive connection error [`f51254d`](/commit/f51254d97a9a04be3eb5750d214c59e0c41ffe76)
- fix some UI like error screen was not visible fully (buttons were clipped behind the screen) on larger scale on large screens [`852dd73`](/commit/852dd737aefc045a1d4193d17803d10a0cce1b48)
- some visual camera world view issues (visible lines between blocks) [`1525fac`](/commit/1525fac2a192f1fe7e2f858480c444948bbe9651)
- adding support for newer skin profile data structure in player heads ([#424](/issues/424))
- adding support for newer skin profile data structure in player heads [`70534d8`](/commit/70534d8b5a64ed9df64229b8933c6adc2ac61ea4)
- stop right click emulation once window got opened eg chest [`d0d5234`](/commit/d0d5234ba43c33d11325696a763163196c3206ad)
- window title sometimes was not showing up on old versions [`8f62fbd`](/commit/8f62fbd4daddbdccf61191949889925bed2b4632)
